text: 你觉得[country]的现有人口是多少？
你认为联合国预计2050年[country]的人口将会是多少？
每100个[country]人当中，你认为有多少个穆斯林？
试想一下到2020年，每100个[country]人中，有多少个穆斯林？
What percentage of [country’s] total annual Gross Domestic Product (that is, the total value of all economic activity in [country]) do you think is spent on health expenditure each year?
Out of every 100 households in [country], how many are owned by someone who lives there?
And what percentage of [country’s] total household wealth do you think the least wealthy 70% in [country] own?
Thinking about the upcoming US Presidential election, do you think that Donald Trump or Hillary Clinton will be elected as president?
Taking all things together, would you say you are:
When asked in a survey in [country], what percentage of people do you think said that, taking all things together, they are very happy or rather happy?
Do you personally believe that having an abortion is morally acceptable, morally unacceptable, or is it not a moral issue?
When asked in a survey in [country], what percentage of people do you think said they personally believe that having an abortion is morally unacceptable?
Do you personally believe that homosexuality is morally acceptable, morally unacceptable, or is it not a moral issue?
When asked in a survey in [country], what percentage of people do you think said they personally believe that homosexuality is morally unacceptable?
Do you personally believe that sex between unmarried adults is morally acceptable, morally unacceptable, or is it not a moral issue?
When asked in a survey in [country], what percentage of people do you think said they personally believe that sex between unmarried adults is morally unacceptable?
